name: donusagi-bot
description: [My-ope office](http://www.my-ope.net/)という社内問合せ特化のAIチャットBotサービスのリポジトリです。

scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development ./node_modules/.bin/watchify app/assets/javascripts/es2015/all.js -o app/assets/javascripts/bundled-es2015.js --extension=.jsx -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ]
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/browserify app/assets/javascripts/es2015/all.js --extension=.jsx -o app/assets/javascripts/bundled-es2015.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ]
